ch.iserver.ace.application
Interface DialogController

All Known Implementing Classes:
DialogControllerImpl
public interface DialogController

Interface to be implemented by that class that is responsible to display the dialogs of the application. This is factored out into an interface to facilitate automatic unit testing of the application logic (handle close, save, save all, open, failures, ...).

Method Detail

showSaveDocument

DialogResult showSaveDocument(String title)
Shows a file chooser for saving the document with the given title. Returns a dialog result whose option specifies whether the user pressed cancel or save. The DialogResult.getResult() method returns a File object if the user decided the document.

Parameters:
title - the title of the document to save
Returns:
a dialog result containing the relevant information

showSaveFailed

void showSaveFailed(DocumentItem item,
                    Exception e)
Shows a message dialog that notifies the user about a failed save attempt.

Parameters:
item - the document for which the save failed
e - the exception thrown while saving

showSaveFilesFailed

void showSaveFilesFailed(Map failed)
Shows a dialog with a list of documents that could not be saved. The passed in Map has keys of type DocumentItem and values of type Exception.

Parameters:
failed - a map containing document items and corresponding exceptions

showOpenFilesFailed

void showOpenFilesFailed(Map failed)
Shows a dialog with a list of files that could not be opened. The passed in Map has String keys (filenames) and values of type Exception.

Parameters:
failed - the list of documents that could not be opened

showSaveFilesDialog

DialogResult showSaveFilesDialog(List candidates)
Shows a dialog that allows to select from a list of candidate documents to save. The method returns a dialog result whose option conveys the desired user action (cancel or proceed). The DialogResult.getResult() object is an array of File instances, representing the list of selected documents.

Parameters:
candidates - the list of candidates to select from
Returns:
a dialog result with the results of the dialog

showFileDoesNotExist

void showFileDoesNotExist(File file)
Shows a message dialog that tells the user that the given file does not exist.

Parameters:
file - the file that does not exist

showFileIsDirectory

void showFileIsDirectory(File file)
Shows a message dialog that tells the user that the given file is a directory and not a file (as expected by the application).

Parameters:
file - the file that is a directory

showConfirmCloseDirty

int showConfirmCloseDirty(String title)
Shows a confirmation dialog that asks the user for confirmation about the closing of a dirty document. The returned value conveys the user's desired action, i.e. either closing the document anyway or not closing the document.

Parameters:
title - the title of the dirty document about to be closed
Returns:
JOptionPane.OK_OPTION or JOptionPane.CANCEL_OPTION

showOpenDocuments

DialogResult showOpenDocuments()
Shows a file chooser that allows the user to open one or more documents. The returned result has as option the users action (cancel or open) and if the action is open then it the result of the DialogResult is an array of File objects.

Returns:
the dialogs result

showOpenFailed

void showOpenFailed(File file)
Shows a message dialog that tells the user that the given file could not be opened.

Parameters:
file - the file that could not be opened

showConfirmOverwrite

int showConfirmOverwrite(File file)
Shows a confirmation dialog that asks the user if it is OK to overwrite the given file, even though it already exists.

Parameters:
file - the file about to be overwritten
Returns:
the users decision (either OK or CANCEL)

showAbout

void showAbout()
Shows an about dialog.

showPreferences

void showPreferences()
Shows the preferences dialog.

showDiscoverUser

DialogResult showDiscoverUser()
Shows a dialog that allows the user to enter an IP address. This IP address is returned as part of a ServerInfo object as result of the DialogResult object.

Returns:
the result of the dialog

showDocumentWithSameNameExists

void showDocumentWithSameNameExists(String title,
                                    File file)
Shows a message dialog that tells the user that a document with the same name is already open. Saving the document as that file fails!

Parameters:
title - the current title of the document to be saved
file - the file for which there is already a document

showInvitationReceived

int showInvitationReceived(String user,
                           String docTitle)
Shows a dialog which asks the user whether he wants to accept an invitation.

Parameters:
user - the name of the inviter
docTitle - the name of the document
Returns:
the result of the confirmation dialog

showKicked

void showKicked(String user,
                String docTitle)
Shows the show kicked dialog, which tells who kicked you from which document.

Parameters:
user - the publisher of the document
docTitle - the title of the document

showSessionTerminated

void showSessionTerminated(String user,
                           String docTitle)

showSessionFailed

void showSessionFailed(String user,
                       String docTitle,
                       int reason)

showJoinRequest

int showJoinRequest(String user,
                    String docTitle)

showInvitationRejected

void showInvitationRejected(String user,
                            String docTitle,
                            int code)

showServiceFailure

void showServiceFailure(int code,
                        String msg)

showDiscoveryFailed

void showDiscoveryFailed(int code,
                         String msg)
